channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Scrippets -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Scrippets -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-38333|2024-09-17T01:51:57.614Z -- wp%20scrippets -- wp%20scrippets
item.description: The WP Scrippets WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to a reflected $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"] value in the ~/wp-scrippets.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.5.1.
